procedure.procedure_code_reasoning: The patient presented with right knee pain and swelling, and the physician's plan included a right knee arthrocentesis. The code 27603, "Incision and drainage", is the closest available code that aligns with this procedure.

diagnosis.diagnosis_code_reasoning: This code represents 'Unspecified tear of unspecified meniscus, current injury, right knee'. Based on the chart, the patient has an acute medial meniscus tear of the right knee diagnosed after a twisting injury while playing basketball, with positive McMurray's test on exam. This diagnosis code accurately reflects the documented injury and assessment.
